summary: This module provides unit tests for the evapotranspiration mapping functionality in the MSW component, verifying that spatial mapping of evapotranspiration data onto model grids behaves correctly under various conditions such as negative spacing, out-ofâ€‘bounds coordinates, and basic mapping scenarios.
business_intent: Validate the correctness of spatial interpolation of evapotranspiration inputs used in water resources modeling, ensuring reliable data handling and error detection before integration into the larger simulation workflow.
